document.full_text: zimbabwe's neighbors are calling on robert mugabe to halt the political violence, intimidation and arrests that have surged since his party began agitating for elections in recent months.
document.title: african leaders pressure president of zimbabwe
lines_and_colors: zimbabwe's neighbors are calling on robert mugabe to halt the political violence, intimidation and arrests that have surged since his party began agitating for elections in recent months.
